statements: SELECT * FROM stem_educators;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM stem_educators WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT id, email FROM stem_educators ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_educators WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT first_name, email FROM stem_educators WHERE institution = 'High School' ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM stem_educators WHERE institution='University A';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM stem_educators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM stem_educators ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_educators WHERE first_name='John' OR last_name='Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_educators FROM stem_educators;
SELECT * FROM Educators;
SELECT educator_name, educator_department FROM Educators ORDER BY educator_department DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_field = 'Biology';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Educators JOIN Researchers ON Educators.educator_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Educators WHERE educator_department='Mathematics';
SELECT educator_name, educator_email FROM Educators WHERE educator_name LIKE '%Johnson%';
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_educators FROM Educators;
SELECT educator_name, educator_department FROM Educators JOIN Researchers ON Educators.educator_department = Researchers.researcher_field;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM Users;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description, instructor_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT paper_title, author_id, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description, Users.username as instructor_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Users ON Courses.instructor_id = Users.user_id WHERE Courses.course_name LIKE '%SQL%';

SELECT paper_id, paper_title, Users.username as author_name, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers INNER JOIN Users ON ResearchPapers.author_id = Users.user_id WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as paper_count FROM Users LEFT JOIN ResearchPapers ON Users.user_id = ResearchPapers.author_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT Users.username as user_name, Courses.course_name, ResearchPapers.paper_title FROM Users JOIN Courses ON Users.user_id = Courses.instructor_id JOIN ResearchPapers ON Users.user_id = ResearchPapers.author_id;
SELECT * FROM Educators;
SELECT name, email FROM Researchers;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT educator_id, name, institution FROM Educators WHERE field_of_expertise = 'Science';
SELECT researcher_id, name, research_focus FROM Researchers WHERE research_focus LIKE '%Machine Learning%';
SELECT * FROM Educators;
SELECT name, email, institution FROM Researchers WHERE research_focus = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT educator_id, name, email, institution, field_of_expertise FROM Educators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, name, institution, research_focus FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University of ABC' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM educators;
SELECT educator_name, email FROM educators WHERE institution='University';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description, educator_name FROM courses JOIN educators ON courses.educator_id = educators.educator_id;

SELECT paper_title, researcher_name, course_name FROM research_papers JOIN researchers ON research_papers.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id JOIN collaborations ON research_papers.paper_id = collaborations.paper_id JOIN courses ON collaborations.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM educators ORDER BY educator_name DESC, email ASC
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE educator_id = 3
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id > 5
SELECT educator_name, institution FROM educators WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE course_id = 2 AND paper_id = 5 ORDER BY collaboration_id DESC
